amazon.organization: Amazon Development Center India Pvt. Ltd., Bangalore
details: Project title: *Self Service tool for A/B Testing*.
Responsible for developing *10+ RESTful APIs* for interacting with backend service.
*Design and developed UI/UX* and connected it with backend APIs.
Integrated *User Authentication* and implemented *Role based access control* for resource access in UI.
Tools used: React, Redux, AWS (DynamoDB, Amplify, CloudFormation, CloudFront, Route 53, Cognito, Certificate Manager, Secrets Manager), Micro-service architecture.

nsut.organization: Netaji Subhas University of Technology, New Delhi
details: Conducting weekly labs and evaluating assignments.
Managed communication between students and faculties.
Design and Developed the front-end and back-end.
Tools used: Java Server Pages, Oracle Database.
Designed a dashboard to show the stats of production line.
Managed Excel sheets of production line.
